actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to establish a National Community Garden Grant Program to promote the prevention and elimination of urban blight and to meet community developmental needs, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Community Garden Grant Program Act of 1993

summary.text: National Community Garden Grant Program Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to award up to 100 community garden program grants. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: National Community Garden Grant Program Act of 1993
A bill to establish a National Community Garden Grant Program to promote the prevention and elimination of urban blight and to meet community developmental needs, and for other purposes.
